add route column to a table containing drug_exposure information

Source: R/pattern.R
addRoute.Rd

Usage

addRoute(drugTable)

Arguments

drugTable

Table in the cdm that must contain drug_concept_id

Value

It adds route to the current table

Examples

# \donttest{
library(DrugUtilisation)
library(dplyr)

cdm <- mockDrugUtilisation()

cdm[["drug_exposure"]] |>
  addRoute()
